definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: Reciprocal teaching is a model of inactive learning's application in reading comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 交互教學就是元認知缺陷觀應用於閱讀教學的典範。

sentences.english: Re-searches has shown metacognition has direct impact on reading ability .
sentences.chinese: 研究表明元認知水平的高低直接影響閱讀能力的高低。

sentences.english: There have been some studies exploring the effect of metacognitive-strategy-based instruction.
sentences.chinese: 同時也有一些研究是基於元認知策略與教學相結合。

sentences.english: What's more, even less empirical studies especially on metacognitive variables of senior middle school students have been conducted in China.
sentences.chinese: 而在中國特別針對高中生元認知的實證研究更是罕見。

sentences.english: The meta-cognitive strategies are of utmost importance to vocabulary learning.
sentences.chinese: 元認知策略對詞彙學習至關重要。

sentences.english: Metacognitive monitoring was most effective expectant variable for state-anxiety and trait-anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 元認知監控是特質焦慮和狀態焦慮最有效的預測變量。

sentences.english: The theory of self-monitoring developed from the research on metacognition.
sentences.chinese: 自我監控理論是在元認知研究的基礎上發展起來的。

sentences.english: Second, mathematical metacognition of Zang-Han junior and senior students and mathematical achievements are positively relevant.
sentences.chinese: 第二，藏漢中學生的數學元認知與數學成績成正相關。

sentences.english: Junior play an important role in forming the habits of metacognition.
sentences.chinese: 初中是爲學生打下元認知習慣的重要階段。

sentences.english: In short, reading is both an intellectual skill and also a meta-cognitive activity.
sentences.chinese: 簡言之，閱讀既是智力技能，也是一種元認知活動。

sentences.english: During this programe, metacognitive strategy fostering was integrated into classroom teaching.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗過程中，元認知策略被融合到課堂教學中。

sentences.english: In this case, it is urgent to cultivate students' meta-cognitive level.
sentences.chinese: 在這一情況下，就迫切需要培養學生的元認知水平。

sentences.english: Metacognition is more important to success than cognition.
sentences.chinese: 元認知力比認知力更有利於成功。

sentences.english: The present paper investigated the employment of metacognitive strategies of medical students.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了醫學類學生元認知策略的使用情況。

sentences.english: Self-awareness corresponds with the ultimate goal of metacognition.
sentences.chinese: 元認知在終極目標上與自我意識是一致的。
